score_adjustments.evidence: AI writing tools: $7.37B market (2025), 85% developer adoption, 46% of code AI-generated. Current SN=2.3 and FA=2.0 are contradicted by massive market validation.

SN.rationale: Structural necessity confirmed: AI writing tools now embedded in enterprise workflows across Fortune 100

FA.rationale: F1 technology force alignment strong: multiple frontier models, rapid improvement cycle

TG.rationale: Already happening (not future): 85% developer adoption, mainstream enterprise deployment

score_adjustments.evidence: GitHub Copilot: 20M users, 50K orgs, 42% market share. Code gen market $7.37B (up from $4.91B). Pull request time -75%. 90% Fortune 100 adopted. GPT-5.3-Codex self-referential development.

SN.rationale: Strongest structural necessity signal in the engine: $7.37B market, 85% adoption, code generation is the defining use case for AI

FA.rationale: Maximum F1 alignment: multiple competing frontier models, self-improving capability cycle

TG.rationale: Transformation already mainstream: 46% of code AI-generated, PR time reduced 75%

score_adjustments.evidence: Energy tech VC $11.6B, battery storage +128% YoY, AI-energy integration opening software layers in traditionally locked sectors.

MO.rationale: Energy sector accessibility validated by VC activity and new modality (battery/nuclear) entry points

score_adjustments.evidence: Grid-scale batteries record deployments 2025. AI managing 22% of clean energy investments. Grid edge is software-accessible.

MO.rationale: Grid edge specifically is software-accessible; battery storage deployments create greenfield monitoring/intelligence opportunities

score_adjustments.evidence: Same evidence as V3-ENERGY-006. Distributed energy specifically benefits from AI cost reduction + battery storage explosion.

MO.rationale: Distributed energy software layer accessible via declining hardware costs and battery storage growth

score_adjustments.evidence: Industrial energy optimization is a software play; energy VC confirms sector accessible.

MO.rationale: Software-layer access confirmed by energy tech VC trends

score_adjustments.evidence: Agentic AI emerging as dominant paradigm. Enterprise adoption crossing tipping point. Infrastructure genuinely more necessary (validated).

CE.rationale: Certainty of evidence increased: agentic AI confirmed as distinct category with growing enterprise adoption

score_adjustments.evidence: Same agentic AI evidence. Multi-agent orchestration is the infrastructure layer needed for autonomous execution.

CE.rationale: Evidence certainty increased by emergence of multiple production agentic systems

new_model_recommendations.name: Retail Media Network Technology Enabler
new_model_recommendations.rationale: 200+ RMNs need tech stack; platform level locked (Amazon/Walmart 84%) but tech enablement is ACCESSIBLE. Decomposition of MC-V38-44-003.

new_model_recommendations.name: Industrial Robotics Integration Platform
new_model_recommendations.rationale: Physical AI funding $13.8B (+77% YoY), capital rotating from digital to physical AI. Middleware for deploying robotics in manufacturing/logistics.

new_model_recommendations.name: Enterprise Autonomous AI Agent Platform
new_model_recommendations.rationale: Agentic AI distinct from copilot/chat. Autonomous multi-step execution. Enterprise adoption accelerating. Extends but distinct from V318-AGT-001.

new_model_recommendations.name: Defense AI Software Platform
new_model_recommendations.rationale: Defense VC $7.7B proves software layer accessible. Carve-out from locked defense platform models. Vertical SaaS for defense mission planning, analytics, training.
